components.name: Stress Source
components.description: StressSource is an internal load-generating source implementation which is very useful for stress tests. It allows User to configure the size of Event payload, with empty headers. User can configure total number of events to be sent as well maximum number of Successful Event to be delivered.

size.name: Size
size.description: Payload size of each Event. Unit:byte

maxTotalEvents.name: Event size
maxTotalEvents.description: Maximum number of Events to be sent

maxSuccessfulEvents.description: Maximum number of Events successfully sent

batchSize.description: Number of Events to be sent in one batch
